name: Obergon
description:
The original, addictive arcade game that's fun and so simple anyone can play it! 

Tap to spark pulses of light that ripple out and push nearby bubbles.

Score points by merging bubbles of the same size and colour.

It's like playing cosmic pool! Create cool chain reactions and clear the screen for bonuses.

No two games will ever be the same.

Challenge your friends to a multiplayer experience!

Play long and prosper...
